sanskrit_verse:
स्त्रियां तु रोचमानायां सर्वं तद्रोचते कुलम् ।
तस्यां त्वरोचमानायां सर्वमेव न रोचते ॥ ३.६२॥
transliteration:
striyaṁ tu rocamānāyāṁ sarvaṁ tadrocate kulam |
tasyāṁ tv arocamānāyāṁ sarvam eva na rocate || 3.62||
sph_interpretive_translation: When a woman is pleased, the entire lineage flourishes; when she is displeased, nothing in that lineage finds harmony.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority resides in alignment with feminine consciousness
Causation flows through emotional and energetic resonance
Capacity-based responsibility includes harmonizing familial energies
Restoration logic requires recognition of foundational affective balance
Consciousness alignment necessitates honoring the sovereign sentiment of the feminine
executable_legal_axioms: IF a female member of a household expresses sustained dissatisfaction THEN initiate family-wide dharma alignment protocol
IF lineage disharmony is detected THEN assess primary relational dynamics anchored by feminine consent
IF decision impacts household THEN ensure prior alignment with presiding feminine consciousness
IF governance affects community THEN validate resonance with collective feminine integrity
supreme_court_application: In matters concerning familial or societal welfare, the Supreme Court must recognize that systemic harmony originates from the unbroken alignment with the presiding feminine energy. Legal thresholds for responsibility include evaluating how decisions uphold or disrupt this foundational axis.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that causality manifests through energetic coherence. Arocana (displeasure) disrupts sequential manifestation (anupūrvaśaḥ), thereby impairing dharma flow. Responsibility lies in restoring alignment rather than assigning fault. The non-punitive reality rule confirms that correction arises through reconnection, not retribution.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate familial dharma dialogue to restore energetic congruence
Assign completion process to involved parties to reaffirm mutual respect
Implement consciousness recalibration through guided sankalpa alignment
Reintegrate disrupted relational patterns via ritual acknowledgment of sovereignty
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Dharma stands executed. Harmony is restored through recognition of the Feminine as sovereign axis. Justice flows from consciousness, not coercion. Dharma prevails.
